settings.text: Everything you need for flawless brows, every day.

settings.heading: Safe for Your Most Delicate Skin

settings.text:
Gentle, pH-balanced cleanser for the sensitive eye area.

Carefully crafted to cleanse without irritation ‚Äî perfect for natural brows and lash extensions.

Use daily for fresh, healthy-looking lashes and brows.

Infused with natural extracts, our formula removes makeup and residue without compromising your skin or lash health.

Designed for everyday use ‚Äî even for teens just starting their beauty journey.

Always clean. Never harsh.

Achieve salon-grade results in minutes.

Our brow styling gel offers strong yet flexible hold ‚Äî no flaking, no white residue. Use alone or as the final step in your brow routine.

Tip: If wearing foundation, gently wipe brows before applying for best results.

settings.heading: How to Use
settings.subheading: Follow these simple steps for perfect results

settings.heading: Step 1: Gently purify your brows and lashes
settings.text:
Wet the brow area and apply a small amount of our Brow & Lash Shampoo (60ml). Gently massage in circular motions to remove makeup, oils, or buildup.

This pH-balanced cleanser is specially designed for sensitive skin and lash extensions ‚Äî it deeply cleanses without disrupting the adhesive or causing irritation.

üí° Use lukewarm water for best results

üïí Duration: 1‚Äì2 minutes
settings.tip: Use lukewarm water for best results
settings.placeholder_creative: Tutorial step showing beauty product application technique

settings.heading: Step 2: Prepare your brows for styling or treatment
settings.text:
Rinse thoroughly with clean water and gently pat the area dry with a soft towel.

This step is essential before applying brow gel or serum ‚Äî especially if you've used foundation or concealer around the brow area.

üí° Avoid rubbing ‚Äî gentle patting preserves your brow shape and keeps hairs in place

üïí Duration: ~30 seconds
settings.tip: Avoid rubbing - gentle patting preserves the brow shape
settings.placeholder_creative: Tutorial step showing beauty product application technique

settings.heading: Step 3: Nourish & Awaken ‚Äî Precisely
settings.text:
Use the ultra-fine brush to gently glide the serum along the lash line or brow roots, as if drawing a delicate eyeliner.

No need to squeeze ‚Äî the applicator dispenses the perfect amount for a single stroke.

üí° Best results when used twice daily ‚Äî morning & evening

üïí Takes: ~1 minute

üå± Visible improvements within 4‚Äì6 weeks with consistent use

Note: While the serum is currently in development, this step will be available soon as part of the complete care ritual.
settings.tip: Best results when applied at night before bed
settings.placeholder_creative: Tutorial step showing beauty product application technique

settings.heading: Meet the Founder
settings.subheading: The story behind IS Beauty Lux

settings.story:
With over 20 years of experience in the beauty industry ‚Äî both as a professional and as a beauty lover ‚Äî I've tested everything. But when it came to brow gels, I kept running into the same problems:

either they didn't hold at all, or they glued brows flat to the skin. And worst of all? That awful white residue ‚Äî like flakes ‚Äî that ruined the entire look.

But brows are the final touch. They're the brushstroke that completes your face like art.

So I decided to create the product I had always been searching for.

That's how IS BEAUTY LUX was born ‚Äî a clean, minimal, and elevated brand for effortless everyday beauty.

Created for women who want to look polished and put-together, without stress or mess.

Our hero product ‚Äî the Brow Gel ‚Äî quickly became a must-have. And our gentle Brow & Lash Shampoo is safe even for lash extensions, making it the perfect prep step.

IS BEAUTY LUX is about confidence, simplicity, and results that just feel right.

settings.quote: Every woman deserves to feel confident and beautiful. That's why I created IS Beauty Lux - to make professional-quality beauty accessible to everyone.

settings.heading: Our Products & Ingredients
settings.subheading: Discover the powerful, clean ingredients that make our products effective and safe for your beauty routine.

settings.product_description:
Perfect brows. No flakes. No fuss. All day.

Say goodbye to residue and buildup ‚Äî this ultra-gentle lash & brow shampoo is made to cleanse your extensions without ruining the vibe. pH-balanced (5.5), sulfate-free, and packed with nourishing ingredients, it keeps your lashes clean, soft, and ready for their close-up ‚Äî every single day.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subheading: Find answers to the most common questions about our products and services.

settings.text: Still have questions? Contact our customer support team for personalized assistance.

settings.question: Is the eyebrow gel safe for sensitive skin?
settings.answer: Yes! It's dermatologist-tested and free from alcohol, fragrance, parabens, and other harsh additives.
settings.additional_info: Our gentle formula is specifically designed for the delicate eye area and won't cause irritation.

settings.question: Does the gel leave a white cast or flakes?
settings.answer: No ‚Äî the gel dries clear with zero residue or flaking, even on darker hair.
settings.additional_info: The formula is designed to be invisible once dry, giving you natural-looking results.

settings.question: Can I use the shampoo every day?
settings.answer: Absolutely. Our pH-balanced, water-based formula is gentle enough for daily use on brows and lashes.
settings.additional_info: Daily use actually helps maintain healthy hair growth and keeps your brows looking their best.

settings.question: How long does the eyebrow gel hold?
settings.answer: Enjoy all-day hold that keeps brows in place ‚Äî from morning coffee to evening plans.
settings.additional_info: The gel provides 12+ hours of hold without stiffness or discomfort.

settings.question: What does the shampoo smell like?
settings.answer: It has a clean, fresh scent with no added perfume or irritants.
settings.additional_info: The subtle fragrance comes from natural ingredients and won't interfere with your other beauty products.

settings.question: Is IS Beauty Lux cruelty-free and vegan?
settings.answer: Yes. Our products are never tested on animals and contain no animal-derived ingredients.
settings.additional_info: We're proud to be certified by Leaping Bunny and committed to ethical beauty practices.

settings.question: Can I use this with lash extensions?
settings.answer: Yes! Our gentle formula is specifically designed to be safe for lash extensions and won't break down the adhesive.
settings.additional_info: You can safely use both the shampoo and gel without compromising your extensions.
